conversations.content: Who met with Iranian medalists and other members of the country’s delegations that took part in the 2024 Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games on Sept. 17, 2024?

Imam Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met with Iranian medalists and other members of the country’s delegations that took part in the 2024 Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games on Sept. 17, 2024.
Where did the meeting between Imam Khamenei and the Iranian delegations take place?
The meeting took place in the Imam Khomeini Hussainiyah on Tuesday, Sept. 17, 2024.
What did Imam Khamenei highlight as the foremost outcome of the Iranian athletes’ participation in the competitions?

Imam Khamenei highlighted the remarkable abilities and the manifestation of the 'national, political, and religious identity' of the Iranian nation as the foremost outcome of the Iranian athletes’ participation in the competitions.
What did Imam Khamenei convey about meeting the nation's most cherished and proud children?

Imam Khamenei conveyed immense joy at the opportunity to meet some of the nation's most cherished and proud children, stating, 'With your medals and behavior, you have brought joy to the hearts of the nation. I sincerely thank you, the coaches, and all those involved.'
How did Imam Khamenei describe international competitions?
Imam Khamenei described international competitions as stages where nations showcase not only their physical strength and athletic skills but also their mental fortitude and self-confidence.
What actions did the Iranian athletes take to present their spiritual capabilities and national-religious identity?

The Iranian athletes presented their spiritual capabilities and national-religious identity through meaningful actions such as donating medals to children in Palestine and Gaza, maintaining their hijab and modesty, naming the delegation after the Infallible Imams (pbut), and taking selfies with the Palestinian flag.
What did Imam Khamenei point out about the efforts of ill-wishers to distort the identity of the Iranian nation?

Imam Khamenei pointed out the continuous efforts of ill-wishers to distort the 'identity, truth, and beliefs' of the Iranian nation. He remarked, 'They claim that religious sentiments have weakened in Iran, but when our champion kisses the Quran in front of perhaps hundreds of millions of viewers and offers a prostration of gratitude [to God], the reality and identity of the Iranian nation, their adherence to their beliefs, and their dedication to Iran’s national greatness becomes prominent.'
How did Imam Khamenei describe the optimism that sports champions bring to society?

Imam Khamenei described the optimism that sports champions bring to society through their medal-winning achievements, stating, 'Some individuals become despondent over a minor physical incident, but when our young athlete demonstrates strength in the Paralympics while seated in a wheelchair, it fills everyone's hearts with hope.'
What did Imam Khamenei underscore about the double standards and biased policies in international sports?

Imam Khamenei underscored the tangibility of the double standards and biased policies of the countries governing international sports during the recent Olympic and Paralympic Games. He noted that while one country is banned from participating due to war, the Zionist regime continues to be included in the competitions, despite killing 41,000 people, including thousands of children, over the course of nearly a year.
What did Imam Khamenei add about the double standards and biased policies in sports?

Imam Khamenei added that, 'These double standards and biased policies, as we have repeatedly pointed out, demonstrate that despite the assertion of sports being free from politics, the most politically driven actions are exercised in the realm of sports.'
What did Imam Khamenei urge Iranian officials to do regarding athletes who choose not to compete against representatives of the Zionist regime?

Imam Khamenei urged Iranian officials to recognize and support athletes who, because of their national or religious beliefs, choose not to compete against representatives of the Zionist regime. He acknowledged that these athletes are making a significant sacrifice and advised sporting officials to pay attention to these athletes as part of their duties.
Who reported on the achievements of the Iranian athletes at the beginning of the meeting?

Ahmad Donyamali, Iran’s Sports and Youth minister, reported on the achievements of the Iranian athletes who participated in the 2024 Paris Olympic and Paralympic competitions at the beginning of the meeting.
What did Ahmad Donyamali proudly remark about the Iranian athletes' achievements?
Ahmad Donyamali proudly remarked, 'In total, the flag of our beloved Iran was raised 37 times at the competition venues.'
Who conveyed their appreciation on behalf of the athletes for the prayers, congratulatory messages, and support received from the Leader of the Islamic Revolution?

Sareh Javanmardi, a holder of several gold medals in shooting from various Paralympic Games, along with Aryan Salimi, a gold medalist in taekwondo at the Paris Olympics, and Rouhollah Rostami, Iran's golden champion in Paralympic weightlifting, conveyed their appreciation on behalf of the athletes for the prayers, congratulatory messages, and support received from the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
What did the athletes extend their gratitude to the Leader of the Islamic Revolution for?
The athletes extended their gratitude to the Leader of the Islamic Revolution for highlighting the spiritual significance of Iran’s champions in these competitions.
